name: BMO Bank Cards
description:
I recreated BMO Bank of Montreal's bank cards in Figma as practice.

I started with recreation of the physical cards, then moved to recreating the Apply Pay format of the cards, and in the end made a translucent version of the cards in both light and dark theme.


To edit the text that's on the cards you will need to download the following font:

https://www.1001freefonts.com/credit-card.font
